Articles.Content:
My YouTube player has always been unstable. I have a 30 MB/s up-link and down-link, but YouTube still found it hard to load videos in 360p.

Today I can't play videos anymore. I don't know why, but when I click on a video nothing happens, just a black screen laughing at me. I've tried updating Chrome, I've tried updating Flash-Player, and I've enabled and disabled YouTube's HTML 5 player. Nothing helps.

Has anyone got the same problem? Have you solved it? I'm getting dangerously bored.

Edit: When changing to HTML 5 the video goes from black-screen to "This video is currently unavailable".

Edited April 25, 2013 by Hocki

youtube servers are down for europe atm...

I am starting to contemplate the descisions i've made in my life. I need youtube back pls

Yup. Looks like it.

Found this just now:

http://www.reddit.com/r/youtube/comments/1d3iuq/did_youtube_just_break/
